Original: 與Halfwaystudio合作酒精路跑活動到8/4, 上來二樓之前一直被樓下的Big Al's的漢堡味給吸引，沒想到樓上一樣可以點餐！這次供應的活動酒單至少6種，比其他店家多了很多選擇。手撕狗和櫛瓜薯條都有夠好吃美味，酒保好聊，店內裝潢也設計的不錯。自己點了凜冬將至，是一種藍莓優酪乳的感覺，非常喜歡。

Original: 調酒、 餐點、氣氛都很不錯，店員親切服務很棒，一開始兩位，後來加了一位，店員也熱心幫我們換到空間舒適的位置，每張椅子都很舒服

Original:
很特別的餐酒館，一樓是麵店二樓是截然不同的世界，好想走路時光隧道到了復古的年代，帶著普普風格的裝潢又有點童趣的感覺.
三樓座位區有DJ台，是由二樓挑高的空間，很喜歡這樣的設計，會與樓下的人有互動感，也可以看到bartender 製作調酒的過程.
有許多細節像是蒙德里安的杯墊，廁所洗手台有一道小彩虹，洗手的過程中和彩虹的光攪和，帶著微醺一切變的很夢幻.
餐點部分有我最愛的生蠔，已經中式料理，這次點了鴨肝滷肉飯，分量很大完全可以非常的飽足.
酒水部分試了店家的house基本紅酒跟白酒，都很順口，調酒部分有一杯非常特別的胡麻豆腐調酒，讓我非常的驚艷！越喝越餓的感覺，瞬間就喝光～
一條龍的設計真的很棒，吃完一樓的牛肉麵再上樓喝杯調酒聽音樂放空～
EN:
Very special dining tavern. On the first floor is the two -floor noodle shop is a completely different world. I really want to walk the Time Tunnel to the retro era. It feels a little childlike with the decoration of Pop's style.
There are DJs on the seat area on the third floor. It is a high space on the second floor. I like this design very much. I will interact with the people downstairs. You can also see the process of BARTENDER making bartender.
There are many details like Mondrian's coasters. There is a small rainbow in the toilet toilet. It is stirred with the rainbow in the process of washing, and it has become fantastic with all the sorrows.
The meal part has my favorite oyster. It has been Chinese cuisine. This time, I ordered duck liver braised pork rice.
The wine part tried the basic red wine and liquor of the store, which was very smooth. There was a very special cup of flax tofu tuning for alcohol, which made me very stunning!The more you feel the more hungry, you will drink it instantly ~
The design of a dragon is really great. After eating the beef noodles on the first floor, I went upstairs to drink a glass of bartender and listen to music ~

Original:
位於市民大道旁邊的Sofa Sofar 在漢堡店的2樓，如果你喜歡吃Big AI’s Burgers 又享受夜生活的話，這是個很棒的地方，不用下樓即可享用著雙重服務。家具有著歷史的痕跡，彷彿來到次元空間，來到1990年代後期的紐約。

1990s年代後期的美國，打贏了冷戰，經濟成長了數倍，帶動股票的飆升，經濟繁華加上觀念藝術中的文字藝術、普普藝術和新普普藝術盛行，藝術家除了創作者的身份外，有的更成為社群名人，藝術品、設計品收到許多人收藏，當代美學也因此展現至生活之中！不知道如今2020s的我們，在2020崩盤後，2021股票飆漲，加上NFTs, Crypto的興起，許多人一夜致富，成為百萬富翁，但隨著戰爭、泡沫化恐懼的延伸，我們會不會跳過經濟繁華，直接回到經濟大蕭條呢？

更多酒吧或藝文活動，都可以上Instagram @alcoholneal 看看呦
EN:
Sofa Sofar, located next to citizens' avenue, is on the second floor of the burger shop. If you like to eat Big AI ’s Burgers and enjoy nightlife, this is a great place. You can enjoy dual services without going downstairs.The family has historical traces, as if coming to the dimension space and New York in the late 1990s.

In the late 1990s, the United States won the Cold War, the economy grew several times, driving the soaring stocks, the prosperity of the economy and the art, Poping art and the new Pupu art in conceptual art prevailing. Some have become community celebrities. Arts and design products have received many people's collection, and contemporary aesthetics has shown it into life!I do n’t know today, after 2020s, after the collapse of 2020, 2021 stocks have soared, plus the rise of NFTS, Crypto, many people get rich overnight and become one millionaires. Skip the economy and return directly to the Great Depression?

For more bars or art activities, you can go to Instagram @Alcoholneal to see 呦
